item.title: The Media Lied To Create Biden’s ‘Decency’ Illusion. Biden Himself Exposed It.
item.description: Joe Biden is only in a position to have pardoned his criminal son because the corrupt media lied about his fake decency.

item.title: Corporate Media Should Be Flogged For Accepting Serial Liar Biden’s Pledge Not To Pardon Hunter
item.description: Corporate media must face severe humiliation and punishment for their role in the Biden family’s corruption, including their recent pardoning ploy.

item.title: Mike Rounds’ Defense Of FBI Corruption Is An Act Of Inexcusable Cowardice
item.description: Any Republican who doesn't 'have any complaints' about Chris Wray's weaponization of the FBI is undeserving of public office.

item.title: Biden Admits His DOJ Is Corrupt
item.description: President Joe Biden admitted on Sunday that his Department of Justice (DOJ) is “infected” by politics. It’s an admission that’s entirely true — but no...

item.title: Biden Claims Hunter Was ‘Unfairly Prosecuted’ While His DOJ Persecutes Political Opponents
item.description: Joe Biden claims his son Hunter was 'unfairly prosecuted' while ignoring the political persecution his own DOJ has unleashed on his opponents.
